## Clustering the cancer types
```{r warning=FALSE}
Dists <- dist(mtcars)
Dendrogram <- hclust(Dists)
ddata <- dendro_data(Dendrogram)
ggdendrogram(Dendrogram,rotate=TRUE) + geom_text(data=ddata$labels,aes(x=x,y=y,label=label),vjust=0)
```

## Wrangling the genetics data
```{r warning=FALSE}
Narrow<- NCI60 %>%
  gather(key=cellLine,value=expression,-Probe)
  
NCI <- Narrow %>%
  group_by(Probe,cellLine) %>%
  summarise(expression=mean(expression)) %>%
  ungroup()
```

```{r}
NewNCI <- NCI %>%
  group_by(Probe) %>%
  mutate(spread=sd(expression)) %>%
  filter(spread>4) %>%
  select(-spread) %>%
  spread(Probe,expression) %>%
  select(-cellLine)
```

```{r warning=FALSE}
Dists <- dist(NewNCI)
Dendrogram <- hclust(Dists)
ddata <- dendro_data(Dendrogram)
ggdendrogram(Dendrogram,rotate=TRUE) + geom_text(data=ddata$labels,aes(x=x,y=y,label=label),vjust=0)
```
